jdbcService.sql: insert into ~tasks ( id, created, modified, creator, target, owner, state, dependency_id, task, task_type, task_input, scheduled, stopped, started, task_output, parent_id, correlation_id, group_id, context_id, service_context, alias, realm, task_queue_id, task_schedule_id ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :creator, :target, :owner, :state, :dependencyId, :task, :taskType, :taskInput, :scheduled, :stopped, :started, :taskOutput, :parentId, :correlationId, :groupId, :contextId, :serviceContext, :alias, :realm, :taskQueueId, :taskScheduleId )
